metadata.title: Good Morning Little School Girl
metadata.songInfo: by Sonny Boy Williamson II (Rice Miller) recording of 1997 from Lie To Me (A&M 540640) ,

Baby I love you, I just can't help help myself You're so good looking pretty babe, I don't need nobody else.
